ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuViews

Class AddPictureDialogFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • DialogFragment
      • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuViews.AddPictureDialogFragment

  • public class AddPictureDialogFragment
extends DialogFragment
    Activity (Dialog Fragment) that is responsible for prompting the user the choice whether of attaching an image to their answer/question and if yes, redirect them to their android picture gallery to select and image. It fetches the image path from the gallery and links it to an image view supplied in ViewQuestionAndAnswer Activity. A small message "Your Picture is attached" will indicate the image chosen by the user has been successfully loaded to the question/answer. Else, this indicates an image size error and a message displaying "too large" or "too small" will be displayed.
    Author:
    Anthony Wu, Oleksii Shevchenko
    See Also:
    Question, Answer, Picture, ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuViews.ViewQusetionAndAnswers
